app.routes package

Submodules

app.routes.cepik module

app.routes.cepik.get_full_report_url() → Response[source]

Retrieves the full report URL for a given car using its registration, VIN, and first registration date.

Returns:

a dictionary containing the car details and the full report URL

app.routes.cepik.insurance_and_mot_details() → Response[source]
Returns:

A JSON response containing insurance and MOT details for a given car.
